mapper.sql: id, supplier, contacts, phonenum, email, description, isystem, type, enabled, AdvanceIn, BeginNeedGet, BeginNeedPay, AllNeedGet, AllNeedPay, fax, telephone, address, taxNum, bankName, accountNumber, taxRate
mapper.select: SELECT FROM supplier supplier0_ WHERE 1=1 AND (supplier0_.type LIKE concat(concat('%',#{type}),'%')) AND supplier0_.enabled='1' ORDER BY supplier0_.id DESC
mapper.update: update supplier set supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phonenum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isystem = #{isystem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AdvanceIn = #{advancein,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BeginNeedGet = #{beginneedget,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BeginNeedPay = #{beginneedpay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, AllNeedGet = #{allneedget,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, AllNeedPay = #{allneedpay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxNum = #{taxnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankName = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accountNumber = #{accountnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxRate = #{taxrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
